attributes.action: Stop "fox hunting" on National Trust property
attributes.background: We pay to be members of The National Trust but I didn't join to have foxes ripped apart by dogs on that land. I will not be renewing my membership until the NT ban "fox hunting" on their property. Please sign if you agree.

rejection.details:
The National Trust is independent of the UK Parliament and Government. You can find out how to contact them here:

https://www.nationaltrust.org.uk/contact-us

You could start a new petition about something the Government or Parliament are responsible for. For example, you could start a new petition asking the UK Government and Parliament to ban all hunting with dogs, including drag and trail hunting, if that's what you'd like to happen.
